meta.name: University of the District of Columbia

design.custom_css: .entry-content {padding:0;} .button-md {background-color:#b8312d !important;} h1, h2, h3, h4 {font-family:'Oswald', sans-serif;} h1 {color:#b7312c;} h2 {color:#b7312c;} body {font-size:14px;line-height:1.5;color:#000;} a.white {color:#fff !important;} a {color:#b7312c;} .home nav.main-color-2-bg {background:transparent !important;} #top-nav nav.main-color-1-bg {background-color:#000 !important;} .rs-fullvideo-cover {background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.5) !important;} .home #slider {margin-top:-110px;z-index:0;overflow:visible;height:auto;} #slider .tp-caption h2{font-size:36px;background:#b7312c;background-width:100%;text-align:left;color:#fff;position:absolute;bottom:20px;right:0;z-index:1000;padding:.5em 2em .5em 1em;} .dropdown-menu li:focus>.sub-menu{visibility:visible} header .dropdown:focus>.dropdown-menu{display:block;opacity:1;z-index:1000;-webkit-transform:scale(1, 1);transform:scale(1, 1);transition:transform 0.3s ease, opacity 0.2s ease .1s;-webkit-transition:-webkit-transform 0.3s ease, opacity 0.2s ease .1s} .dropdown:focus>.dropdown-menu,.dropdown>a:focus+.dropdown-menu,.dropdown>.dropdown-menu-focus{display:block;opacity:1;z-index:1000;-webkit-transform:scale(1, 1);transform:scale(1, 1);transition:transform 0.3s ease, opacity 0.2s ease .1s;-webkit-transition:-webkit-transform 0.3s ease, opacity 0.2s ease .1s} .dropdown:focus>.sub-menu{visibility:visible;} #body-wrap header {z-index:-1;} #body-wrap header #main-nav{z-index:1;} .home-feature-half a{color:#fff;} .home-feature-half a:hover{color:#fff;} .home #main-nav .navbar {z-index:100;} div.sub-menu {background:#b7312c;border-top:5px solid #fff;border-bottom:5px solid #fff;} div.sub-menu ul.menu {padding:0;list-style:none;display:inline;color:#fff;font-family:'Oswald';font-weight:400;font-size:18px;} div.sub-menu ul.menu li {display:inline;margin-right:40px;} div.sub-menu ul.menu li a{color:#fff;} div.sub-menu ul.menu .dropdown:hover .dropdown-menu {display:block;} div.sub-menu ul.menu li ul {background:rgb(162, 164, 163);left:-100px;padding:0;margin:0;border:none;} div.sub-menu ul.menu li ul li {margin:0;} div.sub-menu ul.menu li ul li a{padding:6px 10px;font-size:16px;} div.sub-menu ul.menu li ul li a:hover {background:rgb(141, 141, 141);} .content-pad-3x {padding-top:0;padding-bottom:0;} .widget {padding-bottom:0;} .wpb_button, .wpb_content_element, ul.wpb_thumbnails-fluid>li {margin-bottom:0;} .home-featured-slider h2{font-family:'Oswald', sans-serif;font-weight:700;font-size:2em;color:#fff;} .u_full_row .vc_column_container>.vc_column-inner {padding-right:15px;padding-left:15px;} .home-feature-half .vc_column_container>.vc_column-inner {padding-right:0;padding-left:0;} .home-feature-half h3{font-family:'Oswald',sans-serif;font-weight:700;font-size:36px;color:#fff;} .home-feature-half p {font-size:.8em;} nav {padding:0;} footer {border-top:8px solid #efbd47;margin-top:30px;} #main-nav .navbar-nav>li>a {text-transform:uppercase;padding-top:20px;padding-bottom:20px;padding-right:15px;font-family:'Oswald',sans-serif;font-size:18px;height:auto;} #main-nav .navbar-nav>li>a:before {top:10px;bottom:10px;} #main-nav .main-menu.affix.sticky-light {background:#b7312c !important;} #top-nav {height:70px;} .top-menu {height:48px;} .main-menu>a>.fa-search {display:none;} .rev-btn {font-family:'Oswald', sans-serif !important;font-size:1.7em !important;padding:15px 30px !important;} .navbar-inverse {background-color:#fff !important;} .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a {color:#b7312c !important;} .home #main-nav .navbar-nav>li>a {color:#fff !important;} #main-nav .main-menu .navbar-right {padding-top:20px;} #main-nav .main-menu.affix.sticky-light .navbar-right {padding-top:0;} #main-nav .main-menu.affix.sticky-light .navbar-nav>li>a {color:#fff !important;} #main-nav .main-menu.affix.sticky-light .navbar-nav>li>a:hover {color:#fff !important;} #main-nav .main-menu.affix.sticky-light .navbar-nav>.current-menu-item>a {color:#fff !important;} #main-nav .main-menu.affix .navbar-nav>li>a {padding:15px;} .home a.logo img {display:none;} .home #main-nav .main-menu.affix.sticky-light a.logo img {display:block;} .vc_btn3.vc_btn3-color-orange.vc_btn3-style-modern {background-color:#efbd47;border-color:#efbd47;background-image:none;font-family:'Oswald', sans-serif;text-transform:uppercase;} .page-template-permanent-sticky .page-heading {display:none;} .page-template-permanent-sticky #main-nav .navbar {min-height:0;} .page-template-permanent-sticky .large-header h2{font-size:40px;border-bottom:none;} .post-type-archive-u_event #sidebar {display:none;} .underline-header h2 {border-bottom:3px solid #a2a4a3;padding-bottom:5px;} .CDCalendar caption .cas-colors.white-boxes .wpb_text_column p a{color:#333;} .red-bar-slim {background:#b7312c;padding:5px 0;} .red-bar {background:#b7312c;padding:40px 0;} .red-bar h2{color:#fff;font-size:36px;} h4{color:#b7312c;} .owl-pagination {display:none;} .overlay-top:after {display:none;} .white-boxes .wpb_text_column h3{color:#b7312c;text-transform:uppercase;} .white-boxes a{color:#b7312c;} .news-feed li {list-style:none;} @media (min-width: 1201px) { .container {width:98%;} } @media (max-width: 767px) { #sub-menu-container {display: none;} .hades.tparrows {width:50px;height:50px;} !important;} .tp-caption {padding:0 15px;} } @media (max-width:480px) { .tp-bullets {top:130% !important;} } @media (min-width: 1365px) { .container {width:1350px;} }
